name: Vhomenex
0:
”Alexa, turn on Vhomenex”
”Alexa, turn off Vhomenex”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: For the Vhomenex system, you can now use Alexa to control switches with the comfort of voice. This skill requires the smart home solution powered by Vconnex, which includes a Vconnex's edge devices. Currently, the support includes lights, switches, plugs. You would need to sign in with on Vconnex System to use the skill feature.
